alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 2:26PM EDT until July 07 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CORTLAND...NORTHEASTERN TIOGA AND SOUTHEASTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 226 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brooktondale, or 9 miles southeast of Ithaca, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caroline, Berkshire, Richford, Harford, Brooktondale, Slaterville Springs, Besemer, West Slaterville, Speedville and East Berkshire. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
